<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Quickened Casting](/Feats.aspx?ID=4614) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Bard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=546" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Oracle" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=817" />
<trait label="Sorcerer" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=824" />
<trait label="Spellshape" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=513" />
<trait label="Witch" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=734" />
<trait label="Wizard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=735" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 105 <sup>2.0</sup>, [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 141 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Time Mage](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=191) (Level 12)

**Frequency**
once per day

</column>

---

If your next action is to cast a [cantrip](/Traits.aspx?ID=550) or a spell that is at least 2 ranks lower than the highest-rank spell slot you have, reduce the number of actions to cast it by 1 (minimum 1 action).

**Special** This can only be used on a cantrip or spell from the class matching the one you gained this feat from.
name: Quickened Casting
